spec_data.Name: perl-Net-HTTP
spec_data.Description:
The Net::HTTP class is a low-level HTTP client. An instance of the
Net::HTTP class represents a connection to an HTTP server. The HTTP
protocol is described in RFC 2616. The Net::HTTP class supports HTTP/1.0
and HTTP/1.1.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 04 Sep 2017 05:36:49 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
